item.title: UBER
item.description: score:79 Chances: Longtime money-losing ride-share companies Uber Technologies and Lyft have surprised naysayers by racing toward steady profits. 2023 marked Uberâ€™s first year of being profitable as a public company. Uber outlined better long-term financial goals during its investor day. The buyback announcement highlights UBER’s shareholder-friendly attitude.
